column5: So...do you think you could order a 60 inch muskie?
You could, but someone would say they caught a bigger one.
I wonder how well they would work as bait?????
Now there is a true angler.
The guy in marketing /promotions would have 100's of colours, multiple sizes, sallow and deep diving options.
I bet, in a few more years, we will all be using miniaturized versions of those as fishing lures.
I recall seeing this on Discovery a couple years ago...  Still amazing  G
so cool!!! Where do I get one??
Miniture versions would be great in an aquarium and would keep the guests busy!
I remember that I think as well. It was more of a tuna design. Speed/ efficient movement was the goal.
soon to be added to the Grand River... Electric Carp! w00t! get your bait now.. there will be a shortage on AA's  G
